definitions.definition: One of the components of a compound leaf .

examples: The new leaflets at the end of the branch were a lighter shade of green than the mature leaves.

definitions.definition: A small sheet of paper containing information , used for dissemination of said information, often an advertisement .
examples: A leaflet had been left under the car's windshield wiper .

definitions.definition: A flap of a valve of a heart or blood vessel .

main_definition: ( botany ) One of the components of a compound leaf .
secondary_definitions: A small sheet of paper containing information , used for dissemination of said information, often an advertisement .
( anatomy ) A flap of a valve of a heart or blood vessel .
